headline: Ongoing Caesars Lease Talks Might Change The Case For Investing In VICI Properties (VICI)
summary: In recent months, VICI Properties has been in discussions with key tenant Caesars Entertainment over potential changes to a master lease that represents a substantial share of VICI’s rental income, while continuing to grow its diversified portfolio of 93 experiential assets anchored by flagship Las Vegas Strip properties. At the same time, dividend-focused investors are watching VICI’s commitment to a targeted 75% AFFO payout ratio and recent 4% quarterly dividend increase, as rising short...
